cookiepolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiepolicy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies on our website.

types.strictlynecessary: Strictly necessary: Required for the site to function.
types.performance: Performance: Help us analyze traffic and performance.
types.targeting: Targeting: Used for advertising and personalization.

cookiepolicy.managingdesc: Open the Cookie Preference Manager from the banner to enable or disable categories. If you accept all cookies, we will store your choices and apply them across visits.
cookiepolicy.datasharingdesc: We may share aggregated information with third parties for analytics and advertising. No sensitive personal data is shared by default.

privacypolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacypolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use and protect your personal information.
privacypolicy.informationdesc: We collect information you provide, cookies, and anonymized analytics data to improve the service.
privacypolicy.howweusedesc: Information is used to operate, maintain and provide the features of the website, and to analyze usage patterns.
privacypolicy.yourrightsdesc: You can request access, correction or deletion of your personal data by contacting us on the site.
